com.google.wave.api.Range

Uses of Range in com.google.wave.api
 

Methods in com.google.wave.api that return Range
 Range Annotation.getRange()
          Returns the range of the document which the annotation affects.
 

Methods in com.google.wave.api with parameters of type Range
 void TextView.delete(Range range)
          Deletes the text bounded by the specified range.
 void TextView.deleteAnnotations(Range range)
          Deletes all annotations from the given range.
 java.util.List<Annotation> TextView.getAnnotations(Range range)
          Returns the list of annotations that overlap the given range.
 java.util.List<Annotation> TextView.getAnnotations(Range range, java.lang.String name)
          Returns the list of all annotations overlapping the specified range in the text document that match the given name.
 java.util.List<Element> TextView.getElements(Range range)
          Returns the list of non-text elements that exist within the specified range of the document.
 java.util.List<Annotation> TextView.getStyles(Range range)
          Returns the list of style annotations affecting the specified range of the document.
 java.util.List<Annotation> TextView.getStyles(Range range, StyleType style)
          Returns the list of style annotations affecting the specified range of the document and matching the given StyleType.
 java.lang.String TextView.getText(Range range)
          Returns the text content bounded by the specified range.
 void TextView.replace(Range range, java.lang.String text)
          Replaces the text content bounded by the specified range with the given text.
 void TextView.replaceStyledText(Range range, StyledText styledText)
          Replaces the text bounded by the specified range with the styled text as text and annotations.
 void TextView.setAnnotation(Range range, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
          Sets an annotation affecting the specified range of the document.
 void Annotation.setRange(Range range)
          Sets the range of the annotation.
 void TextView.setStyle(Range range, StyleType style)
          Applies the given style over the specified range of the text document.
 

Constructors in com.google.wave.api with parameters of type Range
Annotation(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value, Range range)
          Constructs an annotation over a range of the document given a (name,value) pair.
